title: Input schema of the Figma MCP Server

figmaAccessToken.title: Figma Personal Access Token
figmaAccessToken.description: Personal Access Token for Figma API authentication. Generate at https://www.figma.com/developers/api#access-tokens

port.title: HTTP Server Port
port.description: Port number for the HTTP server to listen on

oauthClientId.title: OAuth 2.0 Client ID
oauthClientId.description: OAuth 2.0 client ID for multi-user authentication (optional, for future use)

oauthClientSecret.title: OAuth 2.0 Client Secret
oauthClientSecret.description: OAuth 2.0 client secret for multi-user authentication (optional, for future use)

maxConcurrentRequests.title: Max Concurrent Requests
maxConcurrentRequests.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests the server can handle

enableCaching.title: Enable Caching
enableCaching.description: Enable response caching for Figma API requests
